title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When a java editor is opened and the user right-clicks on the left vertical ruler, a menu that allows users to add breakpoints/marks should appear. However, the menu does not appear as expected.
EB: When a java editor is opened and the user right-clicks on the left vertical ruler, a menu should appear that allows users to add breakpoints/marks.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open a java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
